intro:
I love to learn new things and experiment with new technologies.
These are some of the major languages, technologies, tools and platforms I have worked with:

items.title: C
items.detail: Programmed microcontrollers using C for different projects for a University course

items.title: Python
items.detail: Developed a machine learning application using Python

items.title: JavaScript
items.detail: Have been using Javascript professionally for over two years now

items.title: React
items.detail: Have been using React professionally for over two years now

items.title: RubyOnRails
items.detail: Worked on two projects that had a Rails backend and a React frontend.
